text: Daughters of Destiny is a 2017 English-language original Netflix documentary series created by Oscar-winning filmmaker Vanessa Roth, following a group of disadvantaged children in rural India. ==Premise== Daughters of Destiny is shot over seven years, and follows a group of girls from rural India who are denied education because of their caste. ==Cast== * Shilpa Anthony Raj * Abraham George * Ajit George * Mariam George ==Release== It was released on July 28, 2017 on Netflix streaming. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Netflix original documentary television series
title: Daughters of Destiny (2017 TV series)
